Subject: Issues with Bluetooth on MacOS post upgrade
Description:
we recently upgraded the MacOS client from 2.8.4.2 to 2.9.0.7 and upon completion we have 5 users (all MacOS 14.5) who are no longer able to use or connect bluetooth peripherals.

Our global policy in EPP is unchanged (Allow bluetooth mice and keyboards) and there are no device-specific overrides for these users either.
Solution_Comment__c: The fix will be available in 5.9.4.0 and the customer confirmed ticket closure
